attributes.additional_details: So many people advise us to be healthier and seek alternative modes of transport and e scooters are currently not allowed on roads or cycle lanes, with more cycle lanes etc being introduced, e scooters have lights built in and additional lights can be added to the user in darker weather to illuminate them further, with a max speed of 12-15 mph they are hardly super bikes and manual scooters can go faster, in retrospect they are legal to buy but not ride anywhere which seems pointless
attributes.background: Legalise e scooters on public roads and or cycle lanes
